remarks: Lemma for ~ nobndup and ~ nobnddown .  Bound the birthday of ` ( C X. { S } ) ` above.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 10-Apr-2017.)
statement:
nobndlem8.1 $e |- S e. { 1o , 2o } $.
nobndlem8.2 $e |- C = |^| { a e. On | A. n e. F E. b e. a ( n ` b ) =/= S } $.
nobndlem8 $p |- ( ( F C_ No /\ F e. A ) -> ( bday ` ( C X. { S } ) ) C_ suc U. ( bday " F ) ) $.
$d F a b n $.
$d S a b $.
$d a b n $.
